website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive coffee and spice grinder with many extra features. Easy to use and comes equipped with a 200-watt motor.
pros: Stainless steel cup, which helps prevent flavor from traveling between grinds
Inexpensive and particularly good for grinding flax and chia seeds
cons: Some complaints of loose pieces upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Grinding spices and nuts
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Wanted an easy to use, simple to clean, something to tuck away when not in use, to grind spices and nuts. We're vegan and I gotta get those cashews chopped :) This fit the bill to a "t". Now I don't have to messy up my blender or food processor just to do a cup of nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Heitman

customer_reviews.title: Not good for grinding coffee beans at all!
customer_reviews.text: I used this machine twice and it quit. I was trying to grind a pound of beans in small batches and I guess it was not up to the task. It also doesn't grind all the beans. So you wind up with ultra fine ground coffee with a few untouched beans in it. Basically this machine is not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little grinder! Small, but grinds 2-3 handfuls of beans at a time. I hold the grind button until the grinds stop moving, give the grinder a little shake to resettle the contents, and hold the grind button again for about ten seconds. Takes about one minute total. Quick, easy, and efficient! Also, very easy to clean with a dry paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but so far it has been a great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Build quality seems mediocre, but so far it is successfully chopping sugar, coffee beans, and cinnamon sticks into my desired size. The finer you chop/grind the more it sticks to the sides and requires a gentle couple of taps on the top to knock it down before opening or to continue grinding. Not bad for the price point, but I haven't had it long enough to judge it's durability.
customer_reviews.author: AvgJoeOrPrettyMuchSo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grind my coffee beans, and it works well for me. After I use this, I take a slice of bread, tear it to pieces and grind the bread until all the remaining coffee grinds are gone. Then dump the bread crumbs into the trash, and wipe the grinder clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: A great grinder and easy to clean. I had originally gotten this for grinding flax seed which it does well. Now I'm also using it to make my own spice mixes. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Nice grinder, long cord, large enough to grind up flax seeds, I do 2 loads for a weeks worth of ground seeds.
customer_reviews.author: W. Vasiliou

customer_reviews.title: Nice and portable
customer_reviews.text: Great little grinder for my daily coffee needs. Just recently started grinding my own beans and making my own coffee. I like this because it's big enough for my own coffee needs but small enough to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Singh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and it does the trick to grind my ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and it does the trick to grind my coffee beans. However I've had other grinders that are faster and sometimes some of the grounds stick to the bottom and I have to scrape them off. Not a big deal though, overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grinder. I purchased it for spices and it’s very easy to use. Love the price.
customer_reviews.author: Benjie

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do a great job with seeds and herbs as advertised. Also, directions clearly state the blade can be removed, but it cannot be removed. Very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: My_View

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality.I bought it to grind coffee beans. Works well. Would buy it again.Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Its worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I use it after i dry my veggies.great.fast good speed
customer_reviews.author: Macks smith

customer_reviews.title: Just received & used for Spice Grinding. Works awesome.
customer_reviews.text: So far, works like ad. I read reviews & to clean with bread works awesome too. Sorry, not coffee person & won't use for.
customer_reviews.author: Karl A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I use it to ground flax seed each morning for my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Spears

customer_reviews.title: Easehold Coffee Grinder
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Grinds into fine powder very well.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl m.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and inexpensive.  My fourthone.  I give them as gifts and use them
customer_reviews.text: Love this inexpensive unit. I think it is the third or fourth I have owned. I moved and lost the others and or gave them as gifts. Glad to have this back.
customer_reviews.author: melvern glenn roseberry

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little grinder for the price. I ground an entire bag in one sitting. I would not do it again. It got very hot. But for single pot it really works great
customer_reviews.author: mark  s pisch

customer_reviews.title: Quit working at just under 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grinder on 3/13/19, today 7/5/19, it quit working. We grind enough beans to last a week. This grinder did not 4 months. Don't buy it. I'm reaching out to Amazon for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Thrist

customer_reviews.title: At first it was great however, it worked only for about two months
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great however, it worked only for about two months. One day it just stopped working. I would regard this as a disposable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS VERY GOOD TO USE FOR BLENDER COFFEE AND THEY HAVE A GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE TO ANSWER EVERY QUESTION ABOUT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Grinder
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this grinder. We bought it primarily for grinding sunflower seeds. It does a great job with that, and it is easy to get the ground seeds out. We were also happy to find that the electrical cord is not too short.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Navy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT WORKING SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT WORKING SO FAR, GRIND ACCORDING TO YOUR NEED AS IT SAYS MODERATE FINE OR EXTRA FINE IT DOES HAVE A CAPACITY TO DO IT , ONLY YOU HAVE TO READ THE INSTRUCTION FIRST AND MOST.
customer_reviews.author: Human Rights

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have a coffee maker that grinds beans this is the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all. The blade keeps getting stuck and I only use it for dry spices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This makes my preparations for turmeric paste for my dog so much quicker. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: t is not to ground coffee up like pepper
customer_reviews.text: Sometime and few coffee beans don't get ground up even if you let the grinder run for a minute
customer_reviews.author: Donald Eaton

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little machine. Sharp blades, fairly quiet operation & easy to use. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just wondering how to clean the bottom of the grinder being it cannot be removed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grinds Eggshells Perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: I cot this to grind eggshells to a fine powder to use in making my RAW food for my cats. It works perfectly! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: I love it, great for traveling and having your own ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, great for traveling and having your own coffee to take along. I am hooked on Bff Coffees, best coffee ever
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this one
customer_reviews.text: Has no on, off switch. Plug in and unplug to get desired consistency. Directions say to remove blade with special tool, but tool is no where to be found. Don't waste your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass On This Product
customer_reviews.text: When my last grinder needed replacing, I selected this product because I could no longer find my previous grinder. I use my grinder to freshly grind flax seeds. This is a poorly designed grinder and cheaply made. It needs a deeper well, its blades are not efficient, and the motor is very weak. As a result, when I grind the flaxseeds, I have to periodically stop, shake the grinder and regrind. I still wind up with some flaxseeds not ground. My previous grinder made ground flaxseeds in half the time, and thoroughly ground. Since it doesn’t grind flaxseeds well, I don’t see how it possibly could grind coffee beans. I will continue to look for a better grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Coneflower Books

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with this at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with this at all. When I grind coffee beans, I end up with pulverized powder and whole beans not even touched. It doesn't matter if I pulse or grind continuously. I keep trying and get the same results. I'm seriously considering getting another brand. I'm getting very frustrated with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Seeds
customer_reviews.text: I got lucky finding a good grinder for seeds on my first try. There may be better ones, but this one is perfect to grind seeds for my smoothies. And, freshly ground makes a huge difference. A brush makes cleaning easier. P.S. Try sesame seeds for insomnia.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good grinder
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job grinding my chia seeds!The reason why I gave it four stars instead of five is because of the small compartment for grinding . And it is a ltttle messy when opening after you grind
customer_reviews.author: PattieCakes

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: worked like a charm for ONE month... not used everyday. Then went to use it.. and NOTHING... did not even act like it wanted to work. it was clean, dry and kept in its box when not in use....
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Grinds Flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt I am giving this a Five Star rating! This is the 4th grinder I tried and only this one actually worked for Flax Seeds as well. Great products deserve great ratings. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Burkard

customer_reviews.title: works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I've only ground pumpkin seeds and walnuts. works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T

customer_reviews.title: Freshly ground coffee is the best
customer_reviews.text: There's a measuring device on the lid. We buy beans rather than ground coffee. The flavor is so much better. Hubby measures the beans, grinds them, and brews the coffee. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works great so far
customer_reviews.text: It works great so far. Grounds fast. Does not leave residue from previous grounding trapped underneath the blades. I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest l mitchell&clementine whitmore-mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed it to cut up peppers. And it did what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Samual

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this all the time, sometimes multiple times a day as he is learning how to roast his own coffee. It’s a nice, simple, little grinder and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini coffee grinder
customer_reviews.text: I switch between my moccamaster and this Mindkoo mini grinder. It works just as well as my moccamaster. This mini one is good to grind fresh coffee for one cup. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leonor M.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and powerfull grinder. used it for flax ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and powerfull grinder. used it for flax seed, nuts and coffee and every time it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DORITO37

customer_reviews.title: Great for milling seeds!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to mill flax and chia seeds. It works really quick and is pretty quiet. Easy to clean by just wiping it out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The grinder works fine but, there is to much condensation created in ...
customer_reviews.text: The grinder works fine but, there is to much condensation created in the grinder area. After a few consecutive grinds, there is dampness inside which causes the grinded substance to stick inside and hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: meredith williams

customer_reviews.title: ... be used as an herb grinder/powderizer and it works great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be used as an herb grinder/powderizer and it works great for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - for 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this two stars is because it worked great- for about 5 minutes. Then the motor burned out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Audra S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I ground some nuts and black pepper seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Pennilyn

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use it to grind my Flax seeds to a fine powder to add to my shakes for that Omega 3 boost. It is easy to use and clean. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amit freidman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Product -- Fair Price -- Fast Shipping -- AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: John H. Creed

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use it to grind up my fresh, whole flax seeds to put in my morning yogurt. Works like a charm and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemyfamily

customer_reviews.title: I think this is an excellent spice and coffee grinder for the money
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an excellent spice and coffee grinder for the money. It’s compact, and easy to use, and most importantly does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee grinder does its job. I was a little worried when I received it because there is something loose on the inside. But, after using it for about a month I have no problems with the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Doug&Sabah

product_meta.title: Easehold Electric Coffee and Spice Grinder 200W Stainless Steel Blade Portable Pepper Herb Mill Grater
product_meta.description: General Product Name: Electric coffee and spice grinder Apply to: grind coffee beans, spice, herb , pepper or other food ingredients Fit for: Coffee bean, almonds, pecans, walnuts, hemp seed, chia seed, flax seed, coconut pieces etc. Color: Black Grinder: Stainless steel blade Motor Speed： 28000-30000 PRM, 200W Work Mode: Button Press Adjustable Coarse: Yes Dimension:9.5x9.5x18.5cm Gross Weight: 0.7kg Use Tips: Do not let the grinder work empty or keep a long working time. When it work for more than 3 minutes, pause some time before next run.
feature_bullets: ◇Efficient and Powerful: Equipped with a 200W heavy-duty motor, Easehold coffee grinder supports 28000-30000 PRM high speed operation. A full load of beans can be grinded up in 30-60S.

◇One-touch Operating: Simple operated coffee grinder electric with transparent lid, quite simple to use. You can see through the lid to check process. Easy to clean up with cleaning brush after grinder.
◇Multiple Uses: Durable and strong stainless steel blades are suitable not only for coffee beans, but also can perfectly grind spices, herbs, pepper or other food ingredients in a snap.
◇Safe and Reliable: Blade of spice grinder won’t spin without the lid securely in place. Stainless steel interior can avoids rusting to ensure good grinding effect, won’t influence aroma of coffee.
◇Compact and Stylish: Sleek looking with fine ratification makes the electric coffee grinder stylish and elegant. Compact and portable size fit for both household kitchen countertop or travel use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
